animal.question: I go 'Meow'! I like to drink milk. What am I?

hints.text: 🥛 I like to drink from a bowl.
🧶 I like to play with yarn.
😴 I like to take long naps.

animal.question: I say 'Woof woof'! I wag my tail. What am I?

hints.text: 🦴 I love to chew on bones.
🎾 I like to play fetch.
🏡 I am a good friend and pet.

animal.question: I quack and swim in the water. What am I?

hints.text: 🌾 I eat seeds and plants.
🪶 I have feathers and a beak.
🛁 I love playing in the water.

animal.question: I oink and roll in the mud. What am I?

hints.text: 🐷 I have a curly tail.
🐽 I have a snout.
🥓 People might eat me as bacon or ham.

animal.question: I have a long trunk and big ears. What am I?

hints.text: 🥜 I love to eat peanuts.
🐘 I am very big.
🚿 I can spray water with my trunk.

animal.question: I say 'Moo' and give you milk. What am I?

hints.text: 🐄 I live on a farm.
🌱 I eat grass.
🧀 My milk is used to make cheese and yogurt.

animal.question: I hop and have long ears. What am I?

hints.text: 🥕 I like to eat carrots.
🐇 I have a fluffy tail.
🏡 I live in a burrow.

animal.question: I have stripes and live in Africa. What am I?

hints.text: 🦓 My stripes are black and white.
🐴 I look like a horse.
🌿 I eat grass and leaves.

animal.question: I have a long neck and eat leaves from tall trees. What am I?

hints.text: 🦒 I am the tallest animal.
🟫 I have brown spots.
🌿 I like to eat leaves from tall trees.

animal.question: I roar and I am the king of the jungle. What am I?

hints.text: 🦁 I have a big mane.
🐾 I am a big cat.
👑 I am very strong.

bug.question: I have six legs and I like to crawl. Sometimes I am red with black spots! What am I?

hints.text: 🐞 I am small and round.
🌱 I live in the garden.
⚫ You can count black dots on me.

bug.question: I buzz and make honey. What am I?

hints.text: 💛 I am yellow and black.
🌸 I fly from flower to flower.
🍯 I live in a hive and make something sweet.

bug.question: I build hills of dirt in your yard. What am I?

hints.text: 🐜 I am very small and work together.
💪 I can carry things much bigger than me.
🏡 I live in a colony underground.

bug.question: I jump really high and I am green. What am I?

hints.text: 🌿 I like to live in grassy places.
🎶 I make a chirping sound.
Sometimes predators confuse me with an amphibian!

bug.question: I have beautiful wings and fly from flower to flower. First I was a caterpillar. What am I?

hints.text: 🦋 I start as a little egg.
🐛 I eat lots of leaves before changing.
🌈 I come in many different colors.

bug.question: I light up at night. What am I?

hints.text: 💡 I have a bright light in my body.
✨ I twinkle in the dark.
🌙 You can see me best on a summer night.

bug.question: I spin a web to catch my food. What am I?

hints.text: 🕸️ I have eight legs.
🕷️ I am not an insect.
🪰 I like to eat flies.

bug.question: I fly around, but I'm not a butterfly. I have big eyes and like to live near water. What am I?

hints.text: 🌊 I often live near lakes or ponds.
🔎 My big eyes help me see well.
🍃 I can fly very fast and catch other bugs.

bug.question: I eat wood and live in big groups inside trees or houses. What am I?

hints.text: 🪵 I can cause damage to wooden structures.
🐜 I am a type of social insect, like ants.
🌳 I have a queen and many workers.

bug.question: I'm a master of disguise, looking like a twig or a leaf to hide from predators. What am I?

hints.text: 🍃 I can look like a part of a tree.
🌳 I move very slowly.
🌿 My camouflage helps me stay safe from birds.
